name: Banana Upside-Down Cake
author: Dana Campbell
summary: Easy and yummy. Bananas, brown sugar and pecans are baked under a banana cake mix. The pans are then inverted so the bananas end up on top!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine butter and brown sugar, divide and spread evenly between the 2 pans
Sprinkle pecans evenly over both brown sugar mixtures, arrange banana slices evenly over each
Prepare cake mix according to package instructions
Bake in the preheated oven for 40 to 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean
Turn cakes upside down on a platter or plate, gently tap bottom and carefully remove pans, replacing caramel mixture that sticks to pan
